snippet.title: Polynmomial Long Division
snippet.description:
Learn how to do Polynmomial Long Division in this free math video tutorial by Mario's Math Tutoring. We go through some examples dividing one polynomial by another polynomial.

0:10 Reviewing Long Division with Just Numbers
0:40 Introductory Example (x^2 - 2x +1)/(x +3)
1:32 Changing the Signs to the Opposite and Add
2:16 How to Write the Remainder
2:49 Example 1 (4x^3-8x^2 + 6x + 10)/(2x - 1)

Related Videos:

How to do Synthetic Division
https://youtu.be/ImnOzLvPBlU
